feed.title: Hold fees: 402 Payment Required for Lightning itself

entry.title: Hold fees: 402 Payment Required for Lightning itself
entry.summary: ZmnSCPxj has started summarizing proposals, attacks, and threat models on Github to help readers get up-to-speed and avoid falling into the same pitfalls as previous proposals. It is unclear if ZmnSCPxj's incremental routing idea would be in scope for this project. The incremental routing idea was discussed in a thread on the Lightning-dev mailing list.
